doc.title: Bar kizi
doc.plot: Deniz works as a bar singer, to earn her and her mother's living. Her mother doesn't know about her job. On a flight she meets Engin, son of a rich family, and they fall in love with each other. They want to get married yet her boss Kaya is against it and threatens her to reveal the truth to her mom. On their wedding day, Engin's father recognizes Deniz and recalls her singing at the bar. He prevents their marriage. Engin's father and Kaya plan a plot, showing Deniz as Kaya's lover. Yet Engin, secretly hears his father's and Kaya's conversation and saves Deniz. Deniz goes on with her career and Engin becomes an alcoholic. Engin's father asks Deniz to forgive his doings. Deniz sees Engin's miserable condition and forgives him. The two lovers get together.
